replies.body: Stop nerfing Quinn plz. {{champion:133}} {{item:3070}}
They change Quinn to takr out what made her fun, and now are having trouble balencing her... I just, can't we have old Quinn back {{item:3070}}
Malzahar :(
Please make low priority queue only last 10 minutes instead of 20... i know it's bad to leave your teammates but I can't be bothered waiting that long man :/{{summoner:3}}
I can't express how much i agree with this one. _Bump?_ {{champion:36}}

That Veteran's Scars nerf is bullocks xD
The whole great thing about the resolve tree in the new masteries is that you couldn't take a lot of things in it to make you become tanky. You put points in it because you were already tanky and wanted to be tankier. 

The other nerf that is bs in this patch is the Farsight Alteration. This is the only item in the game besides Sightstone and its relatives that can give regular vision that isn't even consistent. As soon as an enemy finds it, poof gone. The vision game is seriously the one thing that I am hating Riot for. This one thing is the first to actually piss me off. Now it feels as if they are seriously trying to make it the support's job to ward and only their job because of the distinct lack of warding that is available.

Honestly, 5 fucking pinks isn't giving vision of shit, especially since they are probably being used as a gank counter-measure rather than for actual vision of a critical location. And as soon as they lose a tower that isn't bot lane, then boom all hope for vision is gone because there are simply not enough wards now. The warding totem is shit because it gives vision for about a minute with a two and a half minute cooldown. And now Farsight radius nerf is literally a poke in the eye. 

Just please Riot, revert all these vision changes because seriously you can't see shit anymore.

GG Riot should go back to year 8
"...outplays **their** known for."

thank fuck you sorted out that quinn blind being so strong...
I have a much greater preference for real blinds than "psuedo". Graves it felt ok to be smoke screened, and it was quite unique! Until some meddling rioter steps in an thinks oh lets just re use this since we can't think of anything better to put in this champion re work. the blind quinn was giving in 5.23 you just felt cheated some how. I mean at least when teemo blinds you you can still "see" you just cant hit anything (with autos), quinn on the other hand you don't know wich way to run or anything cos virtually the whole screen is black! and you are probably dead before it goes away.
It doesn't even feel good from a Quinn player's perspective, because it just doesn' fit her playstyle. It just isn't balanced not is it fun, for anyone.
language
Where are the Yorick buffs? {{champion:83}} {{item:3070}}
{{champion:34}} nerfs???? really?! do you guys have something against mages now?

Are you kidding me? Why was Anivia nerfed? Reducing the chilled duration is the worst thing you can do. You do realise EVERYTHING about Anivia is slow and allowing a 1 second window to actually deal damage is stupid. Anyone can see her Q a mile away..What an absolute joke, Revert this stupid nerf and stop limiting diversity for God sake. Even a swain and malz nerf.. Just lol.
Swain and Malz were fine but Anivia definitely needed this nerf. Her ult was way too spammy for what it is.

Anivia could r from to far away and enemy laners had no choice but to fall back for 2 seconds because of the insane double damage from the chilled e. This nerf just means you actually have to capitalise on opportunities rather than just passively forcing opponents out of lane.
This is really useful, i didnt believe it first but it was a friend who showed me exactly the same and also gave me a few mystery gifts to confirm its real :)

So... they nerf the range of AoE on Guinsoo's, but buff Fervor.... I thought Guinsoos was overpowered on the hybrid auto-attackers such as {{champion:24}} and {{champion:5}} . SO WHY BUFF THEM WITH FERVOR!?
Fervor actually got nerfed. You can no longer stack fervor on minions/monsters and open up an engagement with 10 stacks of fervor. Now you have to hit the Champion for any form of stacks.

is that 4 stacks generated?

Tested in custom, using Trundle's Q on a champion only generated 2 stacks, not 4.

Can we do something about pathing & unit collision in particular? You've made the minion blocks to be too big now. I can't even begin to count the number of times it has cost me a kill or caused my death, particularly troublesome on short range, immobile champions. 

It's just plain embarrassing to press Q on Garen & just watch him run ALL THE WAY AROUND a line of minions to attack the enemy. Maybe remove it from allied minions at the absolute least, nothing worst than your own minions causing death.

are you trying to make it unwise to play an ap mage in the midlane? honestly every patch features mage nerfs and ad buffs. you buff the heck out of zed then nerf a perfectly balanced champ like tf? Tf's reward for farming up and surviving early against champs like yasuo and zed was that he could then wave clear and pressure the map in other ways. terrible balancing choices in the midlane. soon itll just be zed or bust
